text: Sivakasi railway station is a railway station in the town of Sivakasi, Virudhunagar district in Tamil Nadu. ==Jurisdiction== It is belongs to the Madurai railway division of the Southern Railway Zone of Virudhunagar district in Tamil Nadu. The station code is SVKS. ==Line== The station falls on the line between and ==Notable places nearby== * Badrakali Amman temple, Sivakasi * Ninra Narayana Perumal temple * Ayyanar Falls ==References== ==External links== Category:Railway stations in Virudhunagar district Category:Madurai railway division
title: Sivakasi railway station
